column5: You can convert your degree from any discipline or add Marketing Management to become employable nationally and internationally. Marketing Management can be a stand alone advanced degree which focuses on the strategic side of marketing and business at operational level. It allows you to scrutinise all parts of a business to determine issues within a life cycle and customer acquisition giving you options and recommendations for trouble-shooting issues.
column7: Find out about fees: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.  View course fees on the programme page
column9: 12 Months Full Time or 24 Months Part Time
